plot outline: Maathukutty (Mammootty), an unemployed Keralite settled in Germany, is given a chance to organize their association's annual event. The association sends him to India to invite superstars to their event. Maathukutty gets in trouble as the stars refuses the invitation due to some reasons and when his friend gets into a criminal case, unfortunately. How can he escape from these troubles?
title: Kadal Kadannu Oru Maathukutty
plot: Mathukutty, an unemployed man, lives in Germany with his bossy wife. He is given a chance to travel to Kerala to invite famous actors for an event, but all hell breaks loose after his arrival.

Maathukutty (Mammootty), an unemployed Keralite settled in Germany, is given a chance to organize their association's annual event. The association sends him to India to invite superstars to their event. Maathukutty gets in trouble as the stars refuses the invitation due to some reasons and when his friend gets into a criminal case, unfortunately. How can he escape from these troubles?::Arjun Asok
